message.subject: Mtg. w/EES
message.content:
M1.1. Please plan to attend the below meeting on Tuesday, Oct. 23rd. [Y]
[Inform: recipients should attend 10/23 meeting whose details are below]
Sflink1.1
M1.2. Topic: ENA & EES Coverage
[Inform: topic]
M1.3. Place: EB 872
[Inform: place]
M1.4. Time: 4:30-5:30 p.m.
[Inform: time]
M1.5. Date: October 23, 2001
[Inform: date]
M1.6. Attendees: Frank Vickers
M1.7. Chris Calger(by phone)
M1.8. Louise Kitchen
M1.9. John Lavorato
M1.10. David Forster
M1.11. Dave Duran
M1.12. Barry Tycholiz
M1.13. Dave Delainey
M1.14. Janet Dietrich
M1.15. Jeff Ader
M1.16. Mark Bernstein
[Inform: list of attendees]
M1.17. Mollie:
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.18. Chris can dial into the conf. room-the number is (713) 646-8061.
[Inform: Chris can dial into conference room with given phone number]
M1.19. Please let me know if you have any questions.
[Inform: recipients should tell Tammie if they have questions]
M1.20. Thanks!
[Conventional: thanks]
